created.description: Unix timestamp (UTC) for when this document was first created.

updated.description: Unix timestamp (UTC) for when this document was most recently updated.

start.description: Properties of the start time of the event.

datetime.description: Unix timestamp (UTC) for when this event should start.

timezone.description: The original timezone of the event's start time. (e.g. EST: `-5.0`)

end.description: Properties of the end time of the event.

datetime.description: Unix timestamp (UTC) for when this event should end.

timezone.description: The original timezone of the event's end time.

location.description: Properties corresponding to the intended location of the event.

invitees.description: A list of invitees, by either entity or email address.

recurrence.description: A rrule describing the recurrence of this event.

meta.description: Additional metadata to provide along with the document.

keys.description: The name of the metadata property.

values.description: The value of the metadata property.
